headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer application. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The TikTok account access token that you want to revoke. You can either create a new access token via /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or obtain a renewed access token via /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
